task.name: checkres
task.shortdescription: Task for a quick check of image residuals in Fourier space.
task.description:
This task performs the FFT on an image (cube) and overplots the baseline UV tracks. This can be useful to locate baselines responsible of dynamic range limitations. It is interactive: the user can click on any baseline and/or antenna in the plot, and the track of that baseline will be highlighted over the FFT of the image residuals.
If you click on the UV plot (i.e., upper left plot) with the left (right) mouse button, the first (second) antenna of the seelected baseline will be highlighted.

param.name: vis
param.description: Measurement set used in the imaging (or one of them, if several were used).

param.name: residual
param.description: Image (cube) of the residuals. It can also be the PSF, if you want to see the actual pixel weights used in the imaging.
